grade_levels.title: Not Yet Within Expectations
grade_levels.description: With support, the student may be able to read brief, straightforward information and procedures, but is often unable to complete all parts of an assigned task

grade_levels.title: Meets Expectations (Minimal Level)

grade_lines.title: when prompted, analyzes word parts in technical words

grade_levels.description: The student is able to read straightforward information and procedures that include some specialized language and complex ideas; may have difficulty completing longer selections and tasks. Work may lack detail.

grade_levels.title: Fully Meets Expectations

grade_lines.title: uses variety of strategies for technical language

grade_levels.description: The student is able to read straightforward information and procedures that include some specialized language and complex ideas. Work is accurate and complete.

grade_levels.title: Exceeds Expectations

grade_lines.title: chooses effective strategies for challenging material

grade_levels.description: The student is able to read elaborated information and procedures that include specialized language and complex relationships. Work is precise and thorough, often exceeds requirements.

grade_levels.title: Not Yet Within Expectations

grade_lines.title: work is often inaccurate, vague, or incomplete
may confuse main and supporting information
locates some details if asked; omits a great deal

grade_levels.description: With support, the student may be able to read brief, straightforward information and procedures, but is often unable to complete all parts of an assigned task

grade_levels.title: Meets Expectations (Minimal Level)

grade_lines.title: some inferences are illogical or unsupported

grade_levels.description: The student is able to read straightforward information and procedures that include some specialized language and complex ideas; may have difficulty completing longer selections and tasks. Work may lack detail.

grade_levels.title: Fully Meets Expectations

grade_lines.title: work is accurate, clear, and complete
identifies main ideas and restates in own words
supports inferences or interpretations if asked

grade_levels.description: The student is able to read straightforward information and procedures that include some specialized language and complex ideas. Work is accurate and complete.

grade_levels.title: Exceeds Expectations

grade_lines.title: work is precise and thorough; may include insights
identifies and restates main ideas; explains how they are connected
makes accurate, detailed notes in appropriate form

grade_levels.description: The student is able to read elaborated information and procedures that include specialized language and complex relationships. Work is precise and thorough, often exceeds requirements.

grade_levels.title: Not Yet Within Expectations

grade_lines.title: has difficulty making connections to prior knowledge

grade_levels.description: With support, the student may be able to read brief, straightforward information and procedures, but is often unable to complete all parts of an assigned task

grade_levels.title: Meets Expectations (Minimal Level)

grade_lines.title: offers simple comparisons to prior knowledge and beliefs

grade_levels.description: The student is able to read straightforward information and procedures that include some specialized language and complex ideas; may have difficulty completing longer selections and tasks. Work may lack detail.

grade_levels.title: Fully Meets Expectations

grade_lines.title: compares key ideas with prior knowledge and beliefs

grade_levels.description: The student is able to read straightforward information and procedures that include some specialized language and complex ideas. Work is accurate and complete.

grade_levels.title: Exceeds Expectations

grade_lines.title: compares new information with prior knowledge and beliefs; shows insight

grade_levels.description: The student is able to read elaborated information and procedures that include specialized language and complex relationships. Work is precise and thorough, often exceeds requirements.
